title: Slides for the third paper in my PhD
text: Trying to make sense of the work for my current manuscript. Still very much in development. See slides here

title: Esben Lykke
text:
I recently finished my PhD in exercise epidemiology. My work focused on using machine learning models to analyze accelerometry data, specifically to describe sleep habits among children and adolescents. Feel free to explore this site and discover what I spend my time on. And don’t hesitate to contact me.


2023 | PhD in applied machine learning in epidemiology
2017 | MS in sports science, epidemiology
2014 | BS in sports science, exercise physiology



2018 - 2019 | Research assistant, Department of Sport Science, Aarhus University
2019 - 2020 | Research Assistant, Department of Sports Science and Clinical Biomechanics, University of Southern Denmark
For a more comprehensive look at my education and experience, check out my CV.
